import React from "react"; import "./AdminPageAddProduct.css"; import Button from "../ReusableComponents/Button/Button"; import { useAddProductVisibility } from "../../HelperFunctions/AddProductVisibilityContext"; import axios from "axios"; import {useState} from '' const AdminPageAddProduct = () => { const { isAddProductVisible, toggleAddProductVisible } = useAddProductVisibility(); const closeAddProductForm = () => { toggleAddProductVisible(false); }; const [inputFields, setInputFields] = useState({ }) const addProductToDatabase = async () => { try { const submitData = await axios.post( "http://localhost:3009/create", inputFields ); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } }; return ( <> {" "} {isAddProductVisible && (

Please fill out the form below to add a new product

)} ); }; export default AdminPageAddProduct; //TODO: finish the add product component as popup //TODO: style select field
